name: Divergence (itch)
description:
You have so much potential.

Why - think of all the things we could accomplish together!

All the people you could be!

All the sights you could see!

All the places you could go!

But every door opened closes another.

Make your choice.

A puzzling puzzle game about choice and parallel realities. With awesome music by George Abitbol!

The game was created for the Geekopolis Game Jam for which the theme was "parallel realities". I was also wondering whether or not to do a thesis at the time, go figure...
